plot: Lou, 5 years, tames a little mouse. This one will helps her to fill the boredom and the void created by the absences of her mother who is often at the bedside of dying grand-father.
title: La coccinelle et la souris
plot_es: Lou, 5 years, tames a little mouse. This one will helps her to fill the boredom and the void created by the absences of her mother who is often at the bedside of dying grand-father.
plot_en: Lou, 5 years, tames a little mouse. This one will helps her to fill the boredom and the void created by the absences of her mother who is often at the bedside of dying grand-father.
